description: Get to grips with the basics of biology, chemistry, and physics. Learn the scientific method and explore the building blocks of life and matter.

lessons.title: The Scientific Method
lessons.description: Learn the fundamental steps of scientific inquiry and how to apply them

lessons.title: The Importance of Science
lessons.description: Discover how science shapes our understanding of the world

lessons.title: Cell Structure and Function
lessons.description: Explore the basic building blocks of all living organisms

lessons.title: Genetics and DNA
lessons.description: Understand heredity and the molecular basis of life

lessons.title: Atoms and Molecules
lessons.description: Learn about the fundamental particles that make up matter

lessons.title: The Periodic Table
lessons.description: Master the organization of chemical elements

lessons.title: Forces and Motion
lessons.description: Discover the principles that govern how objects move

lessons.title: Energy and Work
lessons.description: Understand different forms of energy and how work is done

lessons.title: Review and Summary
lessons.description: Consolidate your learning with comprehensive review

lessons.title: Further Exploration
lessons.description: Explore advanced topics and real-world applications

lessons.title: Short-Answer Questions
lessons.description: Test your knowledge with focused practice questions

lessons.title: Complete Study Guide
lessons.description: Comprehensive guide for mastering all course concepts
